TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SocketAsyncEventArgs extends System.EventArgs implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class SocketAsyncEventArgs Inherits EventArgs Implements IDisposable
public ref class SocketAsyncEventArgs : EventArgs, IDisposable

summary.span: 表示异步套接字操作。

span.span: Represents an asynchronous socket operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一组的增强功能的一部分提供可供专用的高性能套接字应用程序的替代异步模式的类。The class is part of a set of enhancements to the class that provide an alternative asynchronous pattern that can be used by specialized high-performance socket applications. 此类被专为网络服务器应用程序需要高性能。This class was specifically designed for network server applications that require high performance. 应用程序可以以独占方式使用增强的异步模式，或仅仅在目标 （例如，在接收大量数据时） 的热区域。An application can use the enhanced asynchronous pattern exclusively or only in targeted hot areas (for example, when receiving large amounts of data). 这些增强功能的主要功能是避免在大容量异步套接字 I/O 期间重复分配和同步对象。The main feature of these enhancements is the avoidance of the repeated allocation and synchronization of objects during high-volume asynchronous socket I/O. 当前实现的 Begin/End 设计模式类要求对象为分配的每个异步套接字操作。The Begin/End design pattern currently implemented by the class requires a object be allocated for each asynchronous socket operation. 在新类增强功能，可重用由描述操作的异步套接字对象分配和维护的应用程序。In the new class enhancements, asynchronous socket operations are described by reusable objects allocated and maintained by the application. 高性能套接字应用程序非常清楚必须维持的重叠套接字操作的数量。High-performance socket applications know best the amount of overlapped socket operations that must be sustained. 该应用程序可创建所需的 对象数量。The application can create as many of the objects that it needs. 例如，如果服务器应用程序需要有 15 套接字接受未完成的操作在任何时候，支持高传入客户端连接传输，它可以分配 15 个可重用为该目的的对象。For example, if a server application needs to have 15 socket accept operations outstanding at all times to support incoming client connection rates, it can allocate 15 reusable objects for that purpose. 使用此类执行异步套接字操作的模式包括以下步骤：The pattern for performing an asynchronous socket operation with this class consists of the following steps: 1. 分配一个新的 上下文对象，或从应用程序池中获取一个空闲对象。Allocate a new context object, or get a free one from an application pool. 2. 在上下文设置的属性对象操作有关要执行 （完成回调方法、 数据缓冲区、 偏移量缓冲区，以及数据要传输时，例如最大数量）。Set properties on the context object to the operation about to be performed (the completion callback method, the data buffer, the offset into the buffer, and the maximum amount of data to transfer, for example). 3. 调用适当的套接字方法 (xxxAsync) 以启动异步操作。Call the appropriate socket method (xxxAsync) to initiate the asynchronous operation. 4. 如果异步套接字方法 (xxxAsync) 返回 true，回调中，查询完成状态的上下文属性。If the asynchronous socket method (xxxAsync) returns true, in the callback, query the context properties for completion status. 5. 如果异步套接字方法 (xxxAsync) 返回 false，则已同步完成该操作。If the asynchronous socket method (xxxAsync) returns false, the operation completed synchronously. 可查询上下文属性获取操作结果。The context properties may be queried for the operation result. 6. 重新使用上下文进行另一项操作，将其放回池中，或放弃它。Reuse the context for another operation, put it back in the pool, or discard it. 新的异步套接字操作上下文对象的生命周期是由引用决定应用程序代码和异步 I/O 引用。The lifetime of the new asynchronous socket operation context object is determined by references by the application code and asynchronous I/O references. 作为参数提交给异步套接字操作方法之一后，应用程序不必保留对异步套接字操作上下文对象的引用。It is not necessary for the application to retain a reference to an asynchronous socket operation context object after it is submitted as a parameter to one of the asynchronous socket operation methods. 完成回调返回之前，应用程序会继续引用它。It will remain referenced until the completion callback returns. 但是，它是要保留到上下文的引用，以便它可以为将来的异步套接字操作重复使用的应用程序非常有利。However it is advantageous for the application to retain the reference to the context so that it can be reused for a future asynchronous socket operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现使用的套接字服务器的连接逻辑类。The following code example implements the connection logic for the socket server that uses the class. 在接受连接后, 从客户端读取的所有数据都发送回客户端。After accepting a connection, all data read from the client is sent back to the client. 读取并返回到客户端模式 echo 会一直继续到客户端断开连接。The read and echo back to the client pattern is continued until the client disconnects. 中的代码示例显示此示例使用 BufferManager 类方法。The BufferManager class that is used by this example is displayed in the code example for the method. 中的代码示例显示此示例中使用的 SocketAsyncEventArgsPool 类构造函数。The SocketAsyncEventArgsPool class that is used in this example is displayed in the code example for the constructor. [!code-csharp[NCLAsyncSocketServer#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAsyncSocketServer/CS/AsyncSocketServer.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此构造函数后的所有属性会都将其默认值：After calling this constructor all properties will have their default values: - 对象引用将能为 nullObject references will be null - 返回一个整数的属性将返回零。Properties that return an integer will return zero. - 属性将减至。The property will be equal to . - 属性将减至，将使用它指定任何标志。The property will be equal to , which specifies no flags will be used. - 属性将减至。The property will be equal to . 调用方必须设置之前将对象传递给适当的异步套接字 (xxxAsync) 方法的相应属性。The caller must set the appropriate properties prior to passing the object to the appropriate asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例表示的可重用集合对象。The following code example represents a collection of reusable objects. [!code-csharp[NCLAsyncSocketServer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAsyncSocketServer/CS/AsyncSocketServer.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Sockets::Socket ^ AcceptSocket { System::Net::Sockets::Socket ^ get(); void set(System::Net::Sockets::Socket ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要使用的套接字或创建用于接受与异步套接字方法的连接的套接字。

span.span: Gets or sets the socket to use or the socket created for accepting a connection with an asynchronous socket method.

value.span: 要使用的 或者创建用于接受与异步套接字方法的连接的套接字。

span.span: The to use or the socket created for accepting a connection with an asynchronous socket method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以用于提供已创建将用于异步套接字接受操作。This property can be used to provide an already created that will be used for an asynchronous socket accept operation. 在接受操作完成，则表示已接受的连接的套接字。Upon completion of the accept operation, it is the socket representing the accepted connection. 如果未提供 （设置为 null），然后再调方法，新的套接字将自动创建，并且可在完成回调中使用此属性访问。If not supplied (set to null) before calling the method, a new socket will be created automatically and be accessible in the completion callback with this property.

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<ArraySegment<System::Byte>> ^ BufferList { System::Collections::Generic::IList<ArraySegment<System::Byte>> ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::Generic::IList<ArraySegment<System::Byte>> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个要用于异步套接字方法的数据缓冲区数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of data buffers to use with an asynchronous socket method.

value.span: 一个 ，表示要用于异步套接字方法的数据缓冲区数组。

span.span: An that represents an array of data buffers to use with an asynchronous socket method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于和方法。This property is used with the and methods. 此属性用于提供要发送或提供多个要在其中存储接收到的数据的异步套接字操作，可以发送或接收数据的缓冲区的数据的多个缓冲区。This property is used to provide multiple buffers of data to be sent or to provide multiple buffers in which to store received data for an asynchronous socket operation that can send or receive data. 使用多个缓冲区支持属性和方法。Multiple buffers using the property are supported by the and methods. 如果属性设置为非 null 值，则属性必须为 null，并且将被忽略和方法。If the property is set to a non-null value, the property must be null and is ignored by the and methods. 如果已设置为非 null 值和尝试设置为非 null 值的属性，将引发异常。If the was set to a non-null value and an attempt is made to set the property to a non-null value, an exception is thrown. 如果属性设置为非 null 值，则和方法都会引发。If the property is set to a non-null value, the and methods will throw an . 通过忽略参数和方法。The parameter is ignored by the and methods.

exception.span: 存在不明确的缓冲区，这些缓冲区是在 set 操作上指定的。

span.span: There are ambiguous buffers specified on a set operation.

exception.span: 如果 属性已设置为非空值并且尝试将 属性设置为非空值，将引发此异常。

span.span: This exception occurs if the property has been set to a non-null value and an attempt was made to set the property to a non-null value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BytesTransferred As Integer
public: property int BytesTransferred { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取在套接字操作中传输的字节数。

span.span: Gets the number of bytes transferred in the socket operation.

value.span: 一个 ，包含在套接字操作中传输的字节数。

span.span: An that contains the number of bytes transferred in the socket operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供传输中的异步套接字操作，可以接收或发送数据的字节的数。This property provides the number of bytes transferred in an asynchronous socket operation that can receive or send data. 如果从读取操作返回零，则远程端已关闭了连接。If zero is returned from a read operation, the remote end has closed the connection. 此属性由除之外的所有异步套接字操作设置方法。This property is set by all asynchronous socket operations except the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Completed As EventHandler(Of SocketAsyncEventArgs)

summary.span: 用于完成异步操作的事件。

span.span: The event used to complete an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件提供了客户端应用程序来完成的异步套接字操作的方法。The event provides a way for client applications to complete an asynchronous socket operation. 事件处理程序应连接到中的事件时启动的异步套接字操作的实例，否则应用程序将不能确定操作完成后。An event handler should be attached to the event within a instance when an asynchronous socket operation is initiated, otherwise the application will not be able to determine when the operation completes. 引用的完成回调委托事件包含程序逻辑，以便完成处理客户端的异步套接字操作。The completion callback delegates referenced by the event contains program logic to finish processing the asynchronous socket operation for the client. 当该事件已终止时，应用程序使用对象参数来获取已完成的异步套接字操作的状态。When the event is signaled, the application uses the object parameter to obtain the status of the completed asynchronous socket operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConnectByNameError As Exception
public: property Exception ^ ConnectByNameError { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 当使用 时，在出现连接故障的情况下获取异常。

span.span: Gets the exception in the case of a connection failure when a was used.

value.span: 一个 ，指示在为 属性指定 时发生连接错误的原因。

span.span: An that indicates the cause of the connection error when a was specified for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接失败的情况下时为指定属性，属性将包含指示套接字错误的详细的原因的异常。In the case of a connection failure when a was specified for the property, the property will contain the exception that indicates the detailed cause of the socket error. 当为指定属性并连接失败发生，属性将为`null`引用。When an was specified for the property and a connection failure occurs, the property will be a `null` reference. 连接失败的情况下始终设置属性。The property is always set in the case of a connection failure. 属性包含有关失败的详细信息，如果它已连接到故障。The property contains more information about the failure if it was a failure connecting to a . 如果仅关注应用程序是否连接操作是成功还是失败，则应用程序只需检查属性。If an application is only interested in whether the connect operation succeeded or failed, then the application only needs to check the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisconnectReuseSocket { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定套接字能否在断开操作之后重用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies if socket can be reused after a disconnect operation.

value.span: 一个 ，指定套接字能否在断开操作之后重用。

span.span: A that specifies if socket can be reused after a disconnect operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于更改的行为方法。This property is used to alter the behavior of method. 如果为 true，套接字被断开可以重用方法后断开连接在后续的套接字自动补全接受或连接操作。If true, a socket disconnected by the method can be reused after disconnect completion in subsequent socket accept or connect operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 实例使用的非托管资源，并可选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the instance and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 释放 类使用的资源。

span.span: Frees resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类终结器关闭并释放与关联的资源。The class finalizer closes the and free resources associated with the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastOperation As SocketAsyncOperation

summary.span: 获取最近使用此上下文对象执行的套接字操作类型。

span.span: Gets the type of socket operation most recently performed with this context object.

value.span: 一个 实例，指示最近使用此上下文对象执行的套接字操作类型。

span.span: A instance that indicates the type of socket operation most recently performed with this context object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性描述最近使用此完成的异步套接字操作对象。This property describes the asynchronous socket operation that was most recently completed using this object. 此属性的值将是直到实例用于开始一个异步套接字操作。The value of this property will be until the instance is used to begin an asynchronous socket operation. 然后，属性将设置为所采用的方法中执行操作的类型作为参数。The property will then be set to the type of operation being performed in the methods that take the as a parameter. 此属性可以更轻松地为多个类型的异步套接字操作使用单独的完成回调委托。This property more easily facilitates using a single completion callback delegate for multiple kinds of asynchronous socket operations. 此属性将保持在中有效实例直到实例用于其他异步套接字 (xxxAsync) 操作。This property remains valid in a instance until the instance is used for another asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) operation. 此属性由所有异步套接字 (xxxAsync) 方法设置。This property is set by all asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) methods. 调用的异步套接字方法 (xxxAsync)类设置此属性的值。Calling an asynchronous socket method (xxxAsync) on the class sets this property value. 此属性被用于与该应用程序实现的 SocketAsyncCallback 完成例程。This property is intended for use with the SocketAsyncCallback completion routine implemented by the application.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCompleted(class System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnCompleted (e As SocketAsyncEventArgs)

span.span: The event that is signaled.

summary.span: 表示异步操作完成时调用的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that is called when an asynchronous operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是由用户代码调用的。This method is not callable by user code. 调用此方法获取的内部结构对象完成当前操作时。This method gets called by the internals of the object when the current operation is complete. 此方法用于所有的异步套接字 (xxxAsync) 方法。This method is used with all asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) methods. 创建继承自的类的应用程序可以重写此方法以挂钩到此完成通知并清理任何资源，它分配给该操作的资源。An application that creates a class inheriting from can override this method to hook into this completion notification and clean up any resources that it allocated for the operation. 默认实现将仅引发事件。The default implementation just raises the event. 此方法用于用于后续的异步套接字操作的完成回调作为一个事件处理程序挂钩。This method is used to hook up an event handler to be used as the completion callback for a subsequent asynchronous socket operation. 调用方必须实现至少一个继承自之前开始异步套接字操作使用异步 (xxxAsync) 方法之一在此方法的回调委托类。The caller must implement at least one callback delegate inherited from this method prior to starting an asynchronous socket operation using one of the asynchronous (xxxAsync) methods on the class. 调用方的方法为提供一种客户端应用程序来完成的异步套接字操作。The caller's method provides a way for client applications to complete an asynchronous socket operation. 启动异步套接字操作时，必须实现的回调委托。A callback delegate must be implemented when an asynchronous socket operation is initiated. 完成回调委托继承自方法必须包含程序的逻辑来完成处理客户端的异步套接字操作。The completion callback delegate(s) inherited from the method must contain program logic to finish processing the asynchronous socket operation for the client. 当异步操作终止时，应用程序使用对象参数来获取已完成的异步套接字操作的状态。When an asynchronous operation is signaled, the application uses the object parameter to obtain status of the completed asynchronous socket operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReceiveMessageFromPacketInfo As IPPacketInformation
public: property System::Net::Sockets::IPPacketInformation ReceiveMessageFromPacketInfo { System::Net::Sockets::IPPacketInformation get(); };

span.span: An instance that contains the destination IP address and interface of a received packet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供有关使用接收数据包信息方法。This property provides information about a packet received using the method. 此属性用于方法。This property is used with the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::EndPoint ^ RemoteEndPoint { System::Net::EndPoint ^ get(); void set(System::Net::EndPoint ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置异步操作的远程 IP 终结点。

span.span: Gets or sets the remote IP endpoint for an asynchronous operation.

value.span: 一个 ，表示异步操作的远程 IP 终结点。

span.span: An that represents the remote IP endpoint for an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定远程终结点。This property specifies the remote endpoint. 此属性可以指定要使用连接到远程终结点方法。This property can specify the remote endpoint to which to connect using the method. 此属性可以指定要使用的数据将发送到远程终结点方法。This property can specify the remote endpoint to which to send data using method. 此属性可以指定从其数据已接收使用远程终结点或方法。This property can specify the remote endpoint from which data was received using the or methods. 此属性指定的此远程终结点可以包含 IPv4 或 IPv6 地址。This remote endpoint specified by this property can include an IPv4 or IPv6 address. 此属性用于， ， ，或方法。This property is used with the , , , or methods.

summary.span: 获取或设置要为 方法使用的异步操作发送的缓冲区数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of buffers to be sent for an asynchronous operation used by the method.

value.span: 表示要发送的缓冲区数组的 对象数组。

span.span: An array of objects that represent an array of buffers to be sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件或内存或一组内存数据缓冲区中的文件，可以表示的缓冲区数组。The array of buffers can represent a file or files in memory or a set of memory data buffers. 此属性用于方法。This property is used with the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定由使用的方法。This property specifies the that are used by the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SendPacketsSendSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置发送操作中使用的数据块的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the data block used in the send operation.

value.span: 一个 ，包含在发送操作中使用的数据块的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: An that contains the size, in bytes, of the data block used in the send operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为零，以便选择默认发送大小的套接字层。Set this property to zero to let the sockets layer select a default send size. 此属性设置为 0xFFFFFFFF，调用方以控制的大小和每个发送请求的内容，通过使用属性。Setting this property to 0xFFFFFFFF enables the caller to control the size and content of each send request, achieved by using the property. 此功能可用于单个发送请求的大小施加限制的消息协议。This capability is useful for message protocols that place limitations on the size of individual send requests.

summary.span: 初始化要用于异步套接字方法的数据缓冲区。

span.span: Initializes the data buffer to use with an asynchronous socket method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会设置为 null 的属性和和为零的属性。This method sets the property to null and the and properties to zero.

param.name: offset

summary.span: 设置要用于异步套接字方法的数据缓冲区。

span.span: Sets the data buffer to use with an asynchronous socket method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `offset`和`count`参数不能为负数。The `offset` and `count` parameters can't be negative numbers. 组合`offset`和`count`参数必须是在中的缓冲区数组的边界内属性。The combination of the `offset` and `count` parameters must be in bounds of the buffer array in the property. 此方法会设置属性`count`参数和属性`offset`参数。This method sets the property to the `count` parameter and the property to the `offset` parameter. 如果属性为 null，则此方法将忽略`offset`和`count`参数和集和属性设置为 0。If the property is null, this method ignores the `offset` and `count` parameters and sets the and properties to 0. 此方法不会更改属性。This method does not change the property.

span.span: An argument was out of range.

exception.span: 如果 参数小于零或大于 属性中的数组长度，将发生此异常。

span.span: This exception occurs if the parameter is less than zero or greater than the length of the array in the property.

exception.span: 如果 参数小于零或大于 属性中的数组长度减去 参数的值，也会发生此异常。

span.span: This exception also occurs if the parameter is less than zero or greater than the length of the array in the property minus the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `offset`和`count`参数不能为负数。The `offset` and `count` parameters can't be negative numbers. 组合`offset`和`count`参数必须是在中的数据数组的边界内`buffer`参数。The combination of the `offset` and `count` parameters must be in bounds of the data array in the `buffer` parameter. 此方法会设置 [SetBuffer 方法 (字节\ 属性`buffer`参数，[SetBuffer 方法 (字节\ 属性`count`参数，与 [SetBuffer 方法 (字节\ 属性`offset`参数。This method sets the [SetBuffer Method (Byte\ property to the `buffer` parameter, the [SetBuffer Method (Byte\ property to the `count` parameter, and the [SetBuffer Method (Byte\ property to the `offset` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个可以划分并分配给单个大的缓冲区 [SetBuffer 方法 (字节\ 对象以用于每个套接字 I/O 操作。The following code example creates a single large buffer which can be divided up and assigned to [SetBuffer Method (Byte\ objects for use with each socket I/O operation. 这使缓冲区来轻松地重用，并能防范堆内存碎片化。This enables buffers to be easily reused and guards against fragmenting heap memory. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供的异步套接字操作的完成状态。This property provides the completion status of an asynchronous socket operation. 值为指示成功完成操作。A value of indicates successful completion of an operation. 此属性主要用于应用程序的事件处理程序例程。This property is primarily used in an application’s event handler routine. 此属性用于所有的异步套接字 (xxxAsync) 方法。This property is used with all of the asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) methods.

summary.span: 获取或设置与此异步套接字操作关联的用户或应用程序对象。

value.span: 一个对象，表示与此异步套接字操作关联的用户或应用程序对象。

span.span: An object that represents the user or application object associated with this asynchronous socket operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以用于应用程序与应用程序状态对象关联对象。This property can be used by an application to associate an application state object with the object. 主要原因是，此属性是为应用程序将状态传递到应用程序的事件处理程序 （例如，异步操作完成方法） 的方法。Primarily, this property is a way for an application to pass state to the application’s event handler (for example, the asynchronous operation completion method). 此属性用于所有的异步套接字 (xxxAsync) 方法。This property is used with all of the asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) methods.
